SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

net.rim.device.api.unifiedsearch.searchables
Interface SearchableContentTypeConstants

All Known Implementing Classes:
SearchableContentTypeConstantsInfo
public interface SearchableContentTypeConstants

Defines types of searchables.

Category:
Signed: This element is only accessible by signed applications. If you intend to use this element, please visit http://www.blackberry.com/go/codesigning to obtain a set of code signing keys. Code signing is only required for applications running on BlackBerry smartphones; development on BlackBerry Smartphone Simulators can occur without code signing.
Since:
BlackBerry API 6.0.0

Field Summary
static long CONTENT_TYPE_BROWSER
          Browser.
static long CONTENT_TYPE_CALENDAR
          Calendar.
static long CONTENT_TYPE_CONTACTS
          Contacts.
static long CONTENT_TYPE_DEFAULT_ALL
          Deprecated. use SearchableContentTypeConstantsInfo.getAllContentTypes() instead because this constant's value will not change to incorporate new types.

          Help.

          Instant Message.

          Other web search providers (e.g., Google, Bing, etc.).
static long NON_RIM_APP
          Deprecated.  
 



Field Detail

NON_RIM_APP

static final long NON_RIM_APP
Deprecated. 
Turn on this bit if the searchable is a third-party application.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Category:
Signed: This element is only accessible by signed applications. If you intend to use this element, please visit http://www.blackberry.com/go/codesigning to obtain a set of code signing keys. Code signing is only required for applications running on BlackBerry smartphones; development on BlackBerry Smartphone Simulators can occur without code signing.
Since:
BlackBerry API 7.1.0

CONTENT_TYPE_DEFAULT_ALL

static final long CONTENT_TYPE_DEFAULT_ALL
Deprecated. use SearchableContentTypeConstantsInfo.getAllContentTypes() instead because this constant's value will not change to incorporate new types.

Constant Field Values
Category:
